name: Acrid
title: Test Subject
description: Acrid is a melee-range hybrid who uses powerful poisons to melt tanky enemies.

skillList.name: Poison
skillList.description: Certain attacks Poison enemies, dealing damage equal to 10% of their maximum health over time. Poison cannot kill enemies.
noteList: Deals 1% of target max health or Acrid's damage per second
Non-lethal, will leave at least 1 health

skillList.name: Blight
skillList.description: Attacks that apply Poison apply stacking Blight instead, dealing 60% damage per second.
noteList: Deals 20% of Acrid's damage per tick

skillList.name: Vicious Wounds
skillList.description: Maul an enemy for 200% damage. Every 3rd hit deals 400% damage.

skillList.name: Neurotoxin
skillList.description: Spit toxic bile for 240% damage that poisons enemies hit.

skillList.name: Ravenous Bite
skillList.description: Bite enemy, dealing 310% damage and poisoning them. Deals up to 3x damage to low health enemies.

skillList.name: Caustic Leap
skillList.description: Leap into the air, dealing 320% damage, stunning, and poisoning enemies on impact. Leaves a pool of acid that deals 25% damage.

skillList.name: Frenzied Leap
skillList.description: Leap into the air, dealing 550% damage and stunning enemies on impact. Reduce the cooldown by 2s for every enemy hit.

skillList.name: Epidemic
skillList.description: Release a deadly poison that deals 100% damage and poisons enemies. The disease continually spreads to up to 20 targets.

name: Artificer
title: Herald of the House Beyond
description: The Artificer is a high burst damage survivor who excels in fighting large groups and bosses alike.

skillList.name: ENV Suit
skillList.description: Holding the Jump key causes the Artificer to hover in the air.

skillList.name: Flame Bolt
skillList.description: Fire a bolt for 220% damage that ignites enemies. Hold up to 4.

skillList.name: Plasma Bolt
skillList.description: Fire a bolt for 220% damage that explodes in a small area. Hold up to 4.

skillList.name: Charged Nano-Bomb
skillList.description: Charge up an exploding nano-bomb that deals 400%-1200% damage and stuns all enemies.
noteList: Damage increase also calculated during initial animation, so the minimum damage is 600% (increased with Attack Speed)
The orb fires bolts at nearby enemies on the fly

skillList.name: Charged Nano-Spear
skillList.description: Charge up a piercing nano-spear that deals 400%-1200% damage and freezes all enemies.
noteList: Damage increase also calculated during initial animation, so the minimum damage is 600% (increased with Attack Speed)
Frozen enemies with 30% or less health are instantly killed

skillList.name: Snapfreeze
skillList.description: Create a barrier that freezes enemies for 100% damage. Enemies at low health are instantly killed if frozen.
noteList: Frozen enemies with 30% or less health are instantly killed

skillList.name: Flamethrower
skillList.description: Burn all enemies in front of you for 1700% damage.
noteList: Deals damage 22 times (unaffected by attack speed)
Each hit deals 100% damage, has a Proc Coefficient of 1
Half of hits will set target on fire

skillList.name: Ion Surge
skillList.description: Burst into the sky, dealing 800% damage and stunning nearby enemies.

name: Commando
title: Cornered Gunslinger
description: The Commando is a jack-of-all-trades character that is reliable in all situations of the game.

skillList.name: Double Tap
skillList.description: Shoot twice for 2x90% damage.

skillList.name: Phase Round
skillList.description: Fire a piercing bullet that hits all enemies in a line for 300% damage.

skillList.name: Phase Blast
skillList.description: Fire two close-range blasts that deal 8x200% damage total.

skillList.name: Tactical Dive
skillList.description: Roll a short distance.

skillList.name: Tactical Slide
skillList.description: Slide on the ground for a short distance. You can fire while sliding.

skillList.name: Suppressive Fire
skillList.description: Fire repeatedly, stunning enemies for 100% damage per bullet.
noteList: Number of attack increased by Attack Speed, initially six

skillList.name: Frag Grenade
skillList.description: Throw a grenade that explodes for 175% damage. Deals 4x damage in the center of the explosion. Can hold up to 2.

name: Engineer
title: Fortification Expert
description: The Engineer is a unique class that requires planning and positioning to be successful.

skillList.name: Bouncing Grenades
skillList.description: Charge up to 8 grenades that deal 100% damage each.

skillList.name: Pressure Mines
skillList.description: Place a two-stage mine that deals 300% damage when an enemy walks nearby, or 900% damage if allowed to fully arm. Can place up to 4.

skillList.name: Spider Mines
skillList.description: Place a robot mine that deals 600% damage when an enemy walks nearby. Can place up to 4.

skillList.name: Bubble Shield
skillList.description: Place an impenetrable shield that blocks all incoming damage.
noteList: Only one can be active at a time
Enemies can move inside the barrier, negating its effects
Anything can fire outwards from the shield, and nothing can fire through it inwards (including yourself).

skillList.name: Thermal Harpoons
skillList.description: Enter target painting mode to launch heat-seeking harpoons that deal 500% damage each. Can store up to 4.
noteList: Harpoons cannot be fired without a target

skillList.name: TR12 Gauss Auto-Turret
skillList.description: Place a turret that inherits all your items. Fires a cannon for 100% damage. Can place up to 2.

skillList.name: TR58 Carbonizer Turret
skillList.description: Place a mobile turret that inherits all your items. Fires a laser for 200% damage per second that slows enemies. Can place up to 2.

name: Huntress
title: Judge, Jury, Executioner
description: The Huntress is an extremely mobile but fragile survivor with a high damage output.

skillList.name: Strafe
skillList.description: Quickly fire a seeking arrow for 150% damage. Can be used while sprinting.

skillList.name: Flurry
skillList.description: Draw back a volley of 3 seeking arrows for 3x100% damage. Critical Strikes fire 6 arrows. Can be used while sprinting.

skillList.name: Laser Glaive
skillList.description: Throw a seeking glaive that bounces up to 6 times for 250% damage. Damage increases by 10% per bounce.

skillList.name: Blink
skillList.description: Disappear and teleport forward.

skillList.name: Phase Blink
skillList.description: Disappear and teleport a short distance. Can store up to 3 charges. Can be used while sprinting.

skillList.name: Arrow Rain
skillList.description: Teleport into the sky. Target an area to rain arrows, slowing all enemies and dealing 225% damage per second.

skillList.name: Ballista
skillList.description: Teleport backwards into the sky. Fire up to 3 energy bolts, dealing 3x900% damage.

name: Loader
title: Bionic Powerhouse
description: The Loader is a slow but powerful bruiser that can use her grappling hook to uniquely navigate the environment.

skillList.name: Scrap Barrier
skillList.description: The Loader is immune to fall damage. Striking enemies with the Loader's gauntlets grants a temporary barrier.
noteList: Barrier gain is 5% of your max barrier.

skillList.name: Knuckleboom
skillList.description: Swing at nearby enemies for 320% damage.

skillList.name: Grapple Fist
skillList.description: Fire your gauntlet forward, pulling you to the target.

skillList.name: Spiked Fist
skillList.description: Fire your gauntlet forward, dealing 320% damage and stunning. Pulls you to heavy targets. Light targets are pulled to YOU instead.

skillList.name: Charged Gauntlet
skillList.description: Charge up a piercing punch for 600%-2700% damage. Deals more damage at higher speeds.

skillList.name: Thunder Gauntlet
skillList.description: Charge up a single punch for 2100% damage that shocks enemies in a cone for 1000% damage. Deals more damage at higher speeds.

skillList.name: M551 Pylon
skillList.description: Throw a floating pylon that zaps up to 6 nearby enemies for 100% damage. Can be grappled.
noteList: Maximum 3 Pylons at the same time

name: Mercenary
title: Hired Blade
description: The Mercenary is a high skill melee survivor that uses his many dodges to weave in and out of combat.

skillList.name: Cybernetic Enhancements
skillList.description: The Mercenary can jump twice.

skillList.name: Laser Sword
skillList.description: Slice in front for 130% damage. Every 3rd hit strikes in a greater area for 300% damage.
noteList: The base swing speed is 0.42s per swing

skillList.name: Whirlwind
skillList.description: Quickly slice horizontally twice, dealing 2x200% damage. If airborne, slice vertically instead.
noteList: The animation speed is improved with attack speed

skillList.name: Rising Thunder
skillList.description: Unleash a slicing uppercut, dealing 450% damage and sending you airborne.

skillList.name: Blinding Assault
skillList.description: Dash forward, stunning enemies for 300% damage. If you hit an enemy, you can dash again, up to 3 total.
noteList: The player has 2.66 seconds to use this ability again after striking an enemy (while a charge is available).

skillList.name: Eviscerate
skillList.description: Target the nearest enemy, attacking them for 110% damage repeatedly. You cannot be hit for the duration.
noteList: Deals 7 damage ticks on cast (improved by Attack Speed)

skillList.name: Slicing Winds
skillList.description: Fire a wind of blades that attack up to 3 enemies for 8x100% damage.

name: MUL-T
title: Right Tool for the Wrong Job
description: MUL-T is an aggressive survivor who has the tools necessary for any job!

skillList.name: Multifunctional
skillList.description: MUL-T can hold two equipment at once. The active equipment is swapped by using Retool.

skillList.name: Auto-Nailgun
skillList.description: Rapidly fire nails for 60% damage. Fires six nails when initially pressed.
noteList: Initial press fires six nails, resulting 360% damage and 2.4 proc coefficient if all hits

skillList.name: Rebar Puncher
skillList.description: Fire a piercing rebar that deals 600% damage.

skillList.name: Scrap Launcher
skillList.description: Fire an arcing hunk that explodes for 360% damage. Hold up to 4.
noteList: Once fired, the cooldown will begin, when finished the entire ammo capacity of 4 will be reloaded

skillList.name: Power-Saw
skillList.description: Saw nearby enemies for 1000% damage per second.
noteList: Slightly pulls you forward whenever you hit a target

skillList.name: Blast Canister
skillList.description: Launch a stun canister for 220% damage. Drops stun bomblets for 5x44% damage.

skillList.name: Transport Mode
skillList.description: Zoom forward, gaining armor and speed. Deals 250% damage to enemies in the way. Deals more damage at higher speeds.

skillList.name: Retool
skillList.description: Passively hold TWO equipment at once. Activating 'Retool' switches the active Equipment and MUL-T's primary attack.

name: REX
title: Symbiotes
description: REX is a half robot / half plant that uses HP to cast devastating skills from a distance. The plant nor the robot could survive this planet alone â€“ but thankfully they have each other.

skillList.name: Natural Toxins
skillList.description: Certain attacks Weaken enemies hit, reducing their movement speed, armor, and damage.
noteList: Weaken reduces armor by 30, damage by 40%, and move speed by 40%.

skillList.name: DIRECTIVE: Inject
skillList.description: Fire 3 syringes for 3x80% damage. The last syringe Weakens and heals for 60% of damage dealt.
noteList: Last syringe weakens enemy and heals you when hitting enemy

skillList.name: Seed Barrage
skillList.description: Costs 15% of your current health. Launch a mortar into the sky for 450% damage.
noteList: Because the costs calculated from your current health, your health won't reach 0 by using this skill

skillList.name: DIRECTIVE: Drill
skillList.description: Launch a series of seed bullets into the sky, raining down for 450% damage per second.
noteList: Hits 16 times for 90% damage over 3s (1440% damage total)

skillList.name: DIRECTIVE: Disperse
skillList.description: Fire a sonic boom that pushes and Weakens all enemies hit. Pushes you backwards if you are airborne.

skillList.name: Bramble Volley
skillList.description: Costs 20% of your current health. Fire thorns that pushes and damages all enemies hit for 550% damage. Pushes you backwards if you are airborne. Heals for every target hit.

skillList.name: Tangling Growth
skillList.description: Costs 25% of your current health. Fire a flower that roots for 200% damage. Heals for every target hit.
noteList: Will 'root' enemies in area, making them unable to move
